name: Music For Elevators | Cherub
description:
This prototype was designed to make music for the pause breaks during the 2023 Winter Games event held at the IT University of Copenhagen. 

Every play's procedurally-generated music composition is unique and one-of-a-kind. 

For the best experience, use headphones.

Sturdy | Kind Design
